Melville is located in Portsmouth and right around the corner from Narragansett Bay. title: The open floor plan allows for entertaining and fun family meals.
description: Fairview Cottage,' a newly renovated 800 square foot classic beachfront cottage, is the perfect escape from everyday life!

Offering panoramic water views & direct beach access, this property is the ideal location for a summer get-away with friends and family, or a romantic couples retreat. Wake up to a stunning sunrise, and enjoy your morning coffee on the expansive mahogany deck overlooking the Sakonnet River. This 375 square foot deck is great for sun bathing, reading and relaxing on the lounge furniture and for evening dining and cocktails!

The sprawling beachfront offers an abundance of sea glass and beautiful shells to add to your collection. Being so close to the water's edge, you can truly enjoy the wild life on the river. You will frequently see ducks, herons and the occasional swan!

Painted wood walls, vaulted ceilings and exposed wooden beams promote a cozy cottage atmosphere. The new furnishings and white color palate provides a 'barefoot elegance' that will allow you to unwind in a comfortable yet sophisticated space.

Cook a delicious meal in the newly appointed custom kitchen. Designed with stainless steel appliances, farmers sink and convenient island to feel like your home away from home when preparing a family meal or dinner for two.

The open floor plan allows for entertaining and fun family meals. Guests can comfortably lounge in the living room, dine at the banquette or cuddle up on the couch to watch a surround sound movie on the 65 inch flat screen TV.

There are (2) bedrooms located off of the main living area. Bedroom (1) has a king size bed, walk-in closet, laundry and great morning and afternoon sunlight. Bedroom (2) has a queen size bed with amazing southern water views, a chair for lounging and a cabinet for clothing storage. All bedding is provided and is luxury hotel quality. There is also the option of a air mattress for additional guests upon request.

There is (1) Cottage Style bathroom with a vessel sink, shower and bath tub in one, plenty of storage and a large mirror. Enjoy an outdoor shower after a day of swimming or sun bathing. Towels are provided.
If you are looking to go out for a night on the town, Newport is a short 15 minute drive and offers an amazing variety of activities, dining experiences and entertainment to boot!

title: Island Park waterfront 2nd floor apt, rent incl heat plus wifi plus...
description: Available for  immediate occupancy as an unfurnished apartment with a year's lease.  Rent is $1,600 month but that includes what may be $300 month... gas heat, water, hot water, trash pickup, WIFI, and basic cable. Tenant would pay for electricity.  The pictures show updates are ongoing and this is a waterfront 2nd floor apartment with a large private deck that takes advantage of the fantastic water-views spanning peaceful Blue Bell Cove in Island Park.  This house has 2 apartment on the 2nd floor and Downstairs, on the 1st floor, is Morarty's Liguor Locker.  It is conveniently located less than 30 minutes from Downtown Newport and a few miles from Tiverton, Middletown, Bristol and Roger Williams University.  In the apartment there is a fully applianced eat in kitchen that looks out the sliding glass door to an oversized deck that has the views plus a dishwasher and over the stove microwave .  There are laundry machines in place along with carpeting in the living room and bedrooms.  There are also 2 off-street parking spaces.  Some pets may be possible with a $50 pet rent.  Security deposit equal to one month's rent is required.  Call for an appointment.

title: July, beautiful executive colonial overlooking the Bay
description: Available in July.  This Beautiful Executive Colonial home is available unfurnished with a year or multi-year lease.  It is situated in the Seaside Sandy Point Farms neighborhood proudly looking east with water views of the Sakonnet Passage and a short walk to Portsmouth's Sandy Point Beach.  It is conveniently located a few miles from Downtown Newport, the War College, the Naval Base, and 40 minutes from Providence.  Amenities include a 2 car attached garage and plenty of storage in basement, beautiful sparkling hardwood floors through out whole house, a fully applianced eat-in granite kitchen that opens to a family room with a wood-burning fireplace, a large formal living room plus a formal dining room on the 1st floor.  There also is a beautiful 4 season sun-room with water views leading to the back deck and back yard. In the lower level there is a finished bonus room.  Upstairs there is central air conditioning with 4 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms.  Pets are possible with $100 pet rent.   Tenant pays for utilities: oil heat, electricity, cable, and water.  $3,200 Security deposit is required.

title: March, unfurnished year lease, Town Center, water views, ,
description: Available March 1st as unfurnished with a year's lease.     Video tour:  https://youtu.be/fMgt_vZ43ww

Beautiful recently remodeled home set back off East Main Rd with great east facing Sakonnet River water views.  Conveniently located near the Portsmouth Town Center, highway, less than 10 miles from the War College, Newport's Navy Base, Downtown Newport, Middletown, Tiverton, and Bristol.  Features include: a fully applianced eat in kitchen with granite counter-tops with a dishwasher and a dining area, living room plus a room that could be used as a family or dining room with beautiful hardwood floors, master bedroom suite has a walk in closet and a private bathroom with jacuzzi tub plus a shower,  in addition 2 good sized carpeted bedrooms with a 2nd full bath upstairs, second floor laundry room.  There also is a finished basement with storage and a bulkhead entrance, great wrap around deck and private yard with water views.  Pets are possible with a $50 pet rent.  Tenant pays for utilities: gas heat, electricity, and water.   Security deposit is equal to one month's rent. Call Steve at

title: Furnished home, pets welcomed
description: Lovely two story home on a historic property just north of Newport.  Expansive landscapes grounds to enjoy.  Walking distance to the beach and the Aquidneck Land Trust hiking trials.
Furnished with nautical touches throughout the home.
Gorgeous main floor bathroom has a tiled walk-in shower with grab bars.
Pets are family and always welcome.

title: Lovely Home For Rent
description: This is a charming townhouse that you can call home while you cozy beside the fireplace with your beloved family pet.
A lovely backyard seating area is furnished with a table, chairs, a fish pond, and waterfall.
Located next door to Sakonnet Greenway Trial with easy walking access to the beach and often has wild turkeys roaming the front lawn.  A popular destination for joggers and cyclists.
If you are local, curtesy moving boxes and packaging material are available.  Additional storage is available in a detached loft (accessible via stairs) and a common shared basement.
